The code defines a module for handling wave audio files. It includes a Wave_write class that provides methods for initializing a wave file, setting its parameters (such as number of channels, sample width, framerate, etc.), and writing audio data to the file. The module also defines a named tuple _wave_params for storing the wave file parameters.

Wave文件写入模块，提供打开、错误处理、读取和写入功能。核心类`Wave_write`负责初始化文件指针、设置音频参数（声道数、采样宽度、帧率、帧数、压缩类型和名称），并管理写入状态（已写帧数、已写数据量、数据长度、是否已写头部）。输入为文件对象和音频参数，输出为符合WAVE格式的音频文件。模块还定义常量（PCM、EXTENSIBLE）和用于存储参数的命名元组`_wave_params`。
